ygData.subject: Temple of Sol Ro (was:Ro quest armor pieces)
ygData.msgSnippet: The Temple of Solusek Ro is in Lavastorm across from the SolA entrance. You can go there at lvl 1 (well, if you can run through LS without being attacked)
ygData.messageBody:
The Temple of Solusek Ro is in Lavastorm across from the SolA entrance. You
can go there at lvl 1 (well, if you can run through LS without being
attacked) because they are indifferent to everybody (unless you hail the
Genie, doh!). Also, our armor is NOT the Armor of Ro as the subject implies.
That is the Paladin armor.

Drizben D'Vorn
Defiled High Priest of Innoruuk
Oblivion Knight of the 30th Circle

> From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
>
> Hello folks, could someone tell me where this Solusk Ro place is? i
> haven't
> the foggiest...don't even know what continent its on, LOL. And what lvl
> should you be before you poke your nose in the place?
>
> Sianne
> 29th (one hair away from 30th)
> Xegony
>
